import React from 'react'; import '../styles/ChallengeView.css'; import '../styles/Common.css'; const ChallengeView = (props) => { const {bgcolor, title, steps, minutes, points} = props return(

{title}

{steps}

Steps

{minutes}

Minutes

+{points}

Points
) } export default ChallengeView;
